title: Old Video Shared As Israel PM Netanyahu Celebrating Hezbollah Chief's Death
summary: BOOM found that Benjamin Netanyahu had posted the video on his TikTok account in 2021, much before Hassan Nasrallah's death.

title: What Does Hassan Nasrallah's Assassination Mean For Hezbollah's Future?
summary: Israel has killed Hassan Nasrallah, the leader of Hezbollah, in an airstrike in Beirut, escalating regional tensions.

title: Indian News Channels Give Communal Hue To Gruesome Bengaluru Murder
summary: Bengaluru Police confirmed to BOOM that Muktiranjan Ray has been identified as the sole perpetrator in the case.

title: Trouble In Paradise: How Coldplay Fans Fell Victim to Ticket Scam
summary: Coldplay's desperate Indian fans posted pleas for tickets across social media platforms, unwittingly painting targets on their backs for opportunistic scammers.

title: Video Of Gautam Adani Promoting Investment Opportunity Is An AI Edited Fake
summary: BOOM found the visuals of Gautam Adani were taken from a video uploaded by the Adani Group in 2023 and overlaid with a fake audio generated using AI.

title: Locked For Years: A New Life For Assam Residents As They Finally Get Aadhaar Cards
summary: Residents of Assam have faced hardships due to locked biometrics, losing access to jobs, services, and schemes. While over 5 lakh biometrics have been unlocked, many still await resolution.

title: TDP Shares Cropped Video Of Jagan Reddy Claiming He Rejected Prasad
summary: BOOM that the original video shows Reddy and his wife drinking charanamrit after receiving it from the priests.

title: Old Video of Terror Truck Attack in France Revived as Recent
summary: BOOM found the visuals show the aftermath of an attack by a truck which ran over pedestrians in Nice, France during the Bastille Day celebrations in 2016.

title: AI Voice Clone Used To Show Sundar Pichai Promoting Fake 'Google Invest' Platform
summary: BOOM found that the video is manipulated using AI-voice cloning technology to promote a dubious app called Google Invest.

title: Screenshot Of Pak Company Employees Falsely Linked To Tirupati Ghee Supplier
summary: The CEO of AR Dairy Food Pvt Ltd confirmed to BOOM that the claims linking the company to the Pakistani company A.R. Foods are false.

title: Video Of Sudha Murty Promoting Investing App Is An AI Voice Clone
summary: BOOM found that the video taken from Sudha Murty's speech in Moneycontrol's Startup Conclave held in July, 2023 has been overlaid with a fake audio generated using AI.

title: Video Of Boy Spitting On Flowers In Pakistan Peddled As Muslim Vendor Outside Temple
summary: BOOM found that the viral video of a young boy spitting on the garlands is from Pakistan. A car number plate visible in the background also confirm the video is not from India.

title: Pager Attack On Hezbollah Is An Example Of A Booby Trap: What Does It Mean?
summary: Hundreds of pagers used by members of the armed group Hezbollah exploded across Lebanon on Tuesday, killing several people.

title: Old Video Falsely Shared As Tamil Nadu Man Beaten For Mocking Tirupati Laddus Row
summary: BOOM found that the viral video of Tamil Nadu environmental activist Piyush Manush being beaten by BJP workers is from 2019 and predates the recent Tirupati laddus controversy

title: Video Of Vandalism At Toll Plaza In Bangladesh Peddled With False Claim
summary: BOOM found that the incident happened at Kuril toll plaza in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

title: Bombay HC Strikes Down Centre's Plan For Fact-Check Unit
summary: Bombay High Court's tie-breaking judgment tipped the scale in a 2:1 majority to strike down the Centre's Fact Checking Unit.
